Title: Empirical Evaluation of Hunk Metrics as Bug Predictors
Elements_risk_assessment:
For each bug-fix revision we find the bug-introducing revisions, and in each
bug-introducing revision we mark the hunks as bug-introducing.
UseOF-SZZ: To identify the bug-introducing revisions using the SZZ approach
Summary:
empirically evaluate the use of hunk metrics as predictor of bugs. resent a technique for bug prediction
that works at smallest units of code change called hunksOur classifier
can classify individual hunks as buggy or bug-free with 86 % accuracy,
83 % buggy hunk precision and 77% buggy hunk recall.
Outcome:
Our classifier
can classify individual hunks as buggy or bug-free with 86 % accuracy,
83 % buggy hunk precision and 77% buggy hunk recall.
